tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,Labor and Delivery,Hysteroscopy,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review: I can say Dr. Triveni is an Angel for us...It's been almost  more than a year I am connected with Triveni ma'am, since the time I am trying for a baby. The day I met Triveni ma'am all my problems started getting resolved gradually and with great care, patience and proper guidance of ma'am, I could conceive and finally delivered a healthy term baby girl on 3rd April. Dr. Triveni is very humble and patient friendly. Before advicing anything she always tries to understand the problem and also the past history of the patient, thus the treatment is always on spot and works very well. I still remember the day morning I took my pregnancy test at home and informed her over WhatsApp and for the same day I also booked appointment to visit her at hospital..And in the hospital when I met her she was so happy for me, i could feel that. Throughout my entire pregnancy journey she was always there to guide me even on call and over WhatsApp incase I couldn't make it to hospital and gave the correct advice at right time which helped me to complete the term without any complications. She has taken all the precautionary measures during my pregnancy which has kept both me and my baby healthy till my delivery. Even after my delivery she is taking care of all the aspects of my postpartum journey so that my mental as well as physical health would be in good shape for forever. Most importantly Dr. Triveni is a great human being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy,Infertility,Obstetrics Problems,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: LONG Story. Please READWe planned to have a baby from 2020 and started visiting a few doctors. Honestly there was a lot of negative response and no proper guidance from them. We kept searching for doctors and came across Dr Triveni in the beginning of 2021 in Practo. We started visiting her in her clinic first. My first impression, she is very calm, composed and explains to us every thing in detail. Good part was, she always told us that it may take time (as there were few complications) but we will have a baby. This positivity gave us a lot of assurance plus her lovely behaviour.We visited her always advised and the treatment went on. She explain us in every stage about the problem and what the treatment is about out.I was able to conceive in April, 2022. She guided me through my pregnancy like I am her family member. Always available on phone and messages for me. She has answered my calls during her vacation, during function at her home, while she was traveling. She answered calls at every time and guided me with the medicines or alternate steps.We now have a baby and it is all because of Dr Triveni. She came to our life like God and she will be like one forever for us. We almost lost hope of having a baby but she kept our hopes alive and kept us positive throughout. We don't know how to thank her for what she has done for us but we will be forever grateful to her.Thank You,Sananda and Shubhabrata

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hi I am Shefali.I visited Dr Triveni during my pregnancy's first trimester. I had heavy bleeding issue during my second month. I remember how I got worried and reached Dr's clinic. she checked me and adviced me for a complete bed rest followed by the required medicines.Unnecessarily she has never sent me for any tests or scans.even during when lockdown started she was always approachable via phone.she supported me throughout a lot.During my third trimester I got diagnosed with preeclampsia and used to have a very high blood pressure n swelling.Dr adviced me an appropriate strict diet followed by medicines to keep my bp in track. since I was diagnosed with preeclampsia my pregnancy had become a little complicated so chances were there that I had to give birth a little early around 36 weeks.I still remember the day before my child was born, Dr calmed me down and prepared me for the situation ahead n to face it bravely. today my child is three months old.Even today if there is any health issue I take her suggestion. the staff members too at the clinic have been supportive and helpful.Thank you Doctor for your support, treatment, advice , positivity and friendly way in which you have treated meShashank and Shefali üòäüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cervical Cerclage,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Female Infertility Treatment,
review:
We were trying for baby from last 8yrs and got reference to meet Dr .Triveni mam in 2021 and dream came true in Noble Hospital, Dr.Triveni mam is too good and no second thought so that will feel, you are in safe hands. She took very good care and will be answering all the queries politely and always reachable. Mam usually understands the patient quickly and take proactive steps to make sure all goes good. She gave positive hope and we finally delivered a baby boy in Nov 22. Mam took care of us post the delivery as well. Special thanks to all front desk staffs and nurses in Noble Hospital and are very caring and the environment was peaceful with great hygiene.

Thanks & Regards,
Sashi Rekha & Mohan

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Triveni doctor is literally a life saver. I was suffering from pcos and it was difficult for me to get pregnant, but with her treatment and continuous checkup I got pregnant. I also had a miscarriage when I was 5 months pregnant, the reason was cervical incompetence. I waited few more months to get pregnant again, but this time she suggested cervical stitching to save my pregnancy and I  was put on bed rest. And finally blessed with a baby boy. I want to tell everyone who is looking for a good gynaecologist, please come to her. She is always available whenever u face any problem. And u will definitely end up having a baby for sure. I highly recommend this gynaecologist to every woman out there.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My name is Jyothi Shri N suffering from hernia and fibroids, cyst. Triveni doctor did operation very well...my both operation that hernia with mesh repair work done by Sujay B R...another operation hysterectomy by Laparoscopic done by Triveni  doctor...both my operation done very well ..still now no pain or any complaint. I highly recommend Triveni doctor and Sujay BR. Triveni doctor not only telling the what happened but also told me about my old complications about my right ovary and one simple cyst also there....miracle doctor sort it out my all complications...very good Gynaecologist I ever want to suggest everyone...Sujay BR and Triveni doctors  have good patience... heavy patience needed to remove the sticky hernia that stick in to my uterus....it is god boon that day with patience both doctor took 5 hours time to proper the hernia that sticked to my uterus...then did surgery very well ..i am fine nowI am greatful to both Sujay B R and Triveni doctor.

review: *** **** ****** * **** **** **** She clearly explains the  and the treatment. She is not  only  treating the problems she is treating the root cause.. patiently she sits and listens first. tags: Wait time,
review: Hi mam, I'm Ajitha.... We went to many hospital and lits of medicine taken for pregnancy treatment because of two miscarriages but not satisfied with treatment and finally my husband's friend recommended Dr. Triveni mam though her clinic was bit far away from my place it takes nearly one hour. . Distance is not a matter... the way of treatment, friendly speaking, explains clearly about our doubts. . I have mild PCOS.. She spoke to us very friendly and explains about the procedure step by steps.. I strongly recommended triveni mam who ever looking for good gynic problems. She responds our call and take care of her patients.. I am hoping for my best.... She can only take care of me...Thank you triveni mam, aruna akka and medical staffs..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** * *** ** ***** I had visited dr.Triveni after the loss of my previous pregnancy due to anomalous baby. We consulted her for a prenatal course firstly. During the treatment her friendly behaviour and the way she explains the issues made me so comfortable to plan for the next baby when I had lost the hope of getting healthy baby as l was diabetic and obese.But she made me and my husband strong throughout our pregnancy journey fighting every obstacles. she was our only hope we could rely on and she made it a very successful journey being available at all situations. We are now blessed with a healthy baby girl.Thank you doctor for everything you did to us being close like a friend. I would highly recommend dr.Triveni.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was searching in Practo for a good gynaecologist and I found Dr. Triveni. Her ratings and comments by patients made me to choose her though her clinic was a bit far from my place. When I visited her clinic, there were  already so many waiting and when my turn came I spoke to the Dr and realised that she is so easy to interact and explains why the problem exists and the remedial action required. What I found amazing is that she saw the medications that I was taking and asked me to stop many of them as they were unnecessary and has suggested few natural methods. it was a pleasant experience.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We went to many doctors for pregnancy but not satisfied with treatment and finally we met Dr. Triveni. She spoke to us very friendly and explained about the procedure patiently. Because of her help only I got conceived and throughout my pregnancy she monitered me very well. In the 7th month of pregnancy I got bp and AFI was reduced. We got very tensed but she maintained very well and extended upto 34 weeks only with medicines. During the time of COVID 19 also she responded and monitered me day by day for one and half month and finally we are blessed with baby girl and baby is healthy. She responds to our call at any time nd she takes care of her patients very well. She is real goddess in our life. We will never forget her in our life. She is very kind hearted to poor patients *** ********** *** ** *** **** ****** ** ********** Trust us you will never regret with her treatment. Thank you Dr. Triveni mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review:
*** ****** ** **** *** she explains well and sounds caring. But I had the problem with the cost. For a simple medical termination of pregnancy of my wife I had to pay 650 on practo. 5000 for her for 2 scans which is way too much and 800 for the follow up visit which was just after 6 days and 1500 if I visit again for another scan. When asked about such exorbitant prices the hospital staff said it is costly because I booked from practo. 
5000 for TVS is way too costly.
